definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Today Victoria Harbour is one of the busiest and most magnificent ports in the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港本島被維多利亞港包圍在當中。

sentences.english: To the south of the British mainland, there lies an island that time seems to have forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 在英國本島南部座落著一個似乎被時光遺忘的島嶼。

sentences.english: The island of Formosa past and present .
sentences.chinese: 福爾摩沙本島的歷史與現狀。

sentences.english: This is a turning point in our island history.
sentences.chinese: 這是本島歷史的轉折點。

sentences.english: Sentosa Island in Singapore this southern half kilometers from the city center.
sentences.chinese: 聖淘沙位於新加坡本島南部，離市中心半公里。

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
bay bridge (elevated bridge across stretch of water)
Shuangxi or Shuanghsi township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
